caption.p: Evaluation of the gastric damage. Representative stomachs of the gastric damage explored in the presence of Tagetes lucida essential oil (10 and 31.6 mg/kg, i.p., ( B, C), respectively) or Î²-caryophyllene (3.16 and 10 mg/kg, i.p., ( D, E), respectively) and compared to indomethacin (20 mg/kg, i.p., ( A)) in rats.
